subject: REQ: Pro side of "use inner classes to test private stuff"
msgSnippet: Everyone: I am looking for opinions on the pro side of using inner classes to test the private parts of a class. Since I don t use the technique myself, I
messageBody:
Everyone:

I am looking for opinions on the pro side of using inner classes to test the private parts of a class. Since I don't use the technique myself, I don't know whether there is any advantage to this technique, other than it works. (I could also use JUnitX without cluttering up my source code.)

I am interested in hearing from those of you who employ the technique and have found some real benefit to it over using JUnitX to achieve the same goal.

Thanks.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
http://www.diasparsoftware.com/
telephone: +1 416 791-8603
